short_summary: The Department of National Defence (DND), has a requirement for three (3) Rapid eLearning Product Programmer resources to provide professional services to support the Military Human Resources Management System (Guardian) and the Central Computation Pay System (CCPS) through the development of performance support material in order to apply the new or changed policies, procedures and processes to the systems.
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENTThe Government of Canada will publish on MERX, by electronic means, a Notice of Proposed Procurement for this contract. The notice will include, among other details, the contract period, which will be from date of Contract award to one (1) year later, with an irrevocable option to extend the term of the Contract by up to six (6) additional one-year periods under the same conditions.
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
